commenter_b: As an Australian, observing from afar, ALL your possible candidates are hypocrites and troubling. In a perfect world, Bernie Sanders would be President and the GOP and the Tea Party would have melted into oblivion. However, it's NOT a perfect world, and I'm a realist. Even the darling of the left, Elizabeth Warren, is an avid supporter of Israel, whilst allowing the continued persecution of the Palestinian people. Politics isn't about the best possible person: it's about the least worst. Hillary Clinton is the least worst by a country mile. We know where she stands. We know how she thinks. We know how she works. We know she's a fierce supporter of women's rights. We know she's learnt a lot of painful lessons from her time as first lady, Senator for NY, and as Secretary of State. I also believe that she's learnt from these mistakes to make herself a ...
